name: Orochii Roleplaying Game Engine - The Game
name_original: Orochii Roleplaying Game Engine - The Game
description:
In this world of pixels, the developer left the game on its early stages because of lack of motivation. Help these poor pixellated creatures have a plain life. Maybe not epic as the creator intended. Maybe not thrilling. But at least not dangerous between dumb glitches caused by the dev's lack of skills.

Experience this thing and let your inner feelings reflect your outside emotions like a real strong prospect of living being.

Made for the WOWIE JAM 2.0 using SDL2 and a couple of my old sprites because why not.
